welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mashhad, a city known for its stunning architecture, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our beautiful mosques, bazaars, and gardens, and immerse yourself in the charm of our vibrant city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Olive Garden Restaurant II | رستوران باغ زيتون ٢
restaurants.description: Olive Garden Restaurant II | رستوران باغ زيتون ٢ is a italian restaurant located in Mashhad.
restaurants.address: Mina St (Sajjad Blvd), Mashhad, Khorasan Razavi

restaurants.address: Park Sq. (2nd Marjan), Mashhad, Khorasan Razavi

restaurants.name: Pesaran-e Karim Restaurant (رستوران پسران کریم)
restaurants.description: Pesaran-e Karim Restaurant (رستوران پسران کریم) is a persian restaurant located in Mashhad.
restaurants.address: 22nd Farhad St., Sajjad Blvd. (Khayyam Blvd.), Mashhad, Khorasan Razavi

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mashad Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mashad Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
